channel.title: sdwdate error after last update
channel.description:
Sdwdate fails to fetch time after last update. By commenting ```#Sandbox 1``` inside the Tor user config (sys-whonix) everything works fine.
``` TIME - sdwdate - INFO - PREPARATION: TIME - sdwdate - INFO - /usr/lib/helper-scripts/onion-time-pre-script: Start. Static Time Sanity Check: Within minimum time 'Sun Jan 17 00:00:00 UTC 2021' and expiration timestamp 'Tue May 17 10:00:00 UTC 2033', ok. Tor Bootstrap Result: Tor's Control Port could not be reached. /usr/lib/helper-scripts/onion-time-pre-script: END: Exiting with exit_code '1' indicating 'wait, show error icon and retry.'. TIME - sdwdate - INFO - PREPARATION RESULT: (known) ERROR. TIME - sdwdate - INFO - ```

item.title: sdwdate error after last update
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No worries.

do23bf7m:

You send me a form link where I commented myself.

I didnâ€™t notice that. I am in question answering mode not much looking who asks what.

item.title: sdwdate error after last update

item.description:
Thank you! You send me a form link where I commented myself. Sorry, it was a long time ago.

item.title: sdwdate error after last update
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not and sdwdate issue. Tor issue. See this:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-Gateway_Security#Seccomp
  • Cannot use Seccomp in sys-whonix after update

Read full topic

Sdwdate fails to fetch time after last update. By commenting #Sandbox 1 inside the Tor user config (sys-whonix) everything works fine.
